body.name: TORCHSTAR Swivel LED Under Cabinet Lighting 3CCT, 22 Inch 14W 1050LM, Hardwired & Plug-in, 3 Color Selectable CRI90 120V, Rotatable Lens, ETL Dimmable Under Counter Lights, Aluminum Housing, Pack of 4
features: TORCHSTAR FlexiBright Series - Super Cost-Effective CRI90 Rotatable Cabinet Light
90° Adjustable Lighting: Torchstar new release under cabinet light can be easily rotated to achieve directional lighting
Completed Accessories: All the needed accessories are included in the package. Accessories for TORCHSTAR StableShine Series and FlexiBright Series under cabinet lights are compatible with each other

Hardwired & Plug-n-play Installation Options: In order to facilitate the existing wiring and power arrangement in your home, we have designed two power connection methods, so you can easily connect to the power and use
9-48inch Width Wall Cabinet Universal Compatible: We have thoughtfully designed three different product sizes(8"/12"/22") which can be easily connected to each other

Seamless & Jump Cable Two Connectabe Ways: With the included accessories, you can achieve seamless connections, ideal for straight long cabinet lighting. You can also connect multiple lights using jump cables, making it easy to light the corners of your cabinets without additional plugs

3 Color Temperature Selectable & Dimmable: 3000K/4000K/5000K changeable freely to at any time according to different usage environments. Using the dimmer can achieve smooth dimming from 10% to 100%, meeting your different lighting needs
Quality and safety are always the top priorities of TORCHSTAR: This wall cabinet light has a long service life of 30,000hrs, 3-year warranty and ETL listed, strictly guarantee your safety

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Perfect Choice To Give Your Kitchen A New Look!

Previous page Too dark to cook. Without under cabinet lights, so hard to make a meal. That's great! The bright kitchen made me fall in love with every moment of cooking. Next page 1 Without Lights 2 With Lights
Previous page Next page 1 Hardwired Installation 2 Plug -in Installation 3 Comparison 4 Linkable 5 Seamless & Jump Cable
Previous page Next page 1 3CCT Selectable 2 Dimmable 3 Completed Accessories 4 Dimensions

Hardwired/Plug-in Powered by 120V voltage, these LED under counter lights can be directly wired or plugged in. When direct wired, this light can smoothly dim from 100% to 10% with compatible dimmers and has a beautiful appearance thanks to no wires being exposed outside. The plug-in method is super simple and doesn't need a transformer. Changeable Color Temperature These LED under cupboard lights feature 3 color temperatures, 3000K warm white/4000K cool white/5000K daylight. Each light has an on/off and color temperature adjustable switch, letting you separately control each lights' color temperature and use. Whether you want neat clean or warm light, you can adjust it at any time.

Specifications Wattage 14W Voltage AC 120V CCT 3000K/4000K/5000K CRI >90 Luminous flux 1050lm Rotatable angle 0°~90°(After Installation) Maximum number of connections 20pcs 22inch lights (Max load 300W a power cord) Dimming range 10%-100% Dimmers Compatible with triac dimmers Waterproof rating IP20 Working temperature 14℉-104℉ Lifespan 30,000hrs Housing Color White Housing Material Aluminum

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Everything works great.
reviews.reviewText: Once installed they work great. Nice and bright, all switches work for color and on off. Seem to be decent quality. Don't know about longevity yet.These seem like they're designed to bring a small diameter wire in from your home wiring, as there isn't room for the wire nuts and heavy wire inside the light housing. I was lucky enough to have room to push the wire nuts and house wiring inside the wall and bring a small diameter wire out to the unit. I also had a phillips driver that fit in the holes to install the mounting screws, so mounting to the cabinets was easy.Overall happy with purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Affordable, feature-rich, and relatively easy to install. We are VERY PLEASED!
reviews.reviewText: I wasn't certain that I would be able to install these lights, but I did so, with no issues. Full disclosure, I don't even begin to consider myself a handyman, rather just a husband with a to do list. These lights weren't difficult at all!We love the 3 color options: 3000, 4000 and 5000. We ended up choosing the 4000 kelvin natural light option, but that is sheer preference.We also like and appreciate the swivel design. We have one under-cabinet area in the corner much deeper than the rest. The swivel allows us to evenly light it up, without it looking dark.And lastly, we so appreciate all of the installation options. You can plug it right into a wall outlet, or you can use and adjust your current wiring to make it all work right. All in all, we are very pleased with these lights, and we would buy them again if needed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 8, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Mounting Screws are Too Long.
reviews.reviewText: My husband and I got these lights to put in while we were remodeling our kitchen. We wanted the lights to be hardwired in. Installing the lights was somewhat straightforward but the included screws to mount them up underneath the cabinets were too long so we had to find shorter screws so that they would not puncture through the bottom of our cabinets.Also there is not much room to work with when your hard-wiring the wires. You cannot have much wire left or it will not fit in the Box even having the minimum amount of wire is hard to get into the box.The lights are all interconnected with the included jumper cables. We got two 8-in lights and 6 12-in lights. When using the cables in between the lights we had to connect two together when we were doing the inner corner cabinet, so keep that in mind. One cable was not long enough to reach diagonally for the light that we put underneath the inner corner cabinet.I also have noticed flickering of the lights since we installed them a couple months ago. The flickering actually started soon after they were installed, if we have the brightness turned all the way up with the dimmer switch (not included). They do still occasionally flicker even when we have them on other settings but more so if they're turned all the way up. I don't know if this is a dimmer switch issue or the lights themselves.The light modes/color (warm/cool) work well and the brightness is good. The make working at the counter much nicer with the light. I also like to leave the lights on the lowest brightness in the evening so that there's a little bit of light in the kitchen when I go in; instead of, it being completely dark.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful for under cabinet lighting
reviews.reviewText: Well made, Easy to install, gives off plenty of light in three different settings!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Beautiful under cabinet lights. Three light settings. Can be wired or plugged in. I used hard wired method and love them

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent bright lights
reviews.reviewText: Great quality item, lights up our counter tips very well, not like the battery ones. These can link together and are thin and metal housing. Definitely reccomend

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A little tough!!
reviews.reviewText: Great product, but it can be difficult to install. The instructions are good but trying to push the wiring in the compartment and trying to screw the cap on at the same time is rough. It really tires out your arms. Make sure your not too close to your wall because it makes it difficult to tighten the wire clasp. Overall, great light, no hum, and worth the money.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice under cabinet lights
reviews.reviewText: I needed to replace my undercabinet lights with another wired lighting solution. These were one of the few available. I was able to install them all in about an hour. I like the varying shades of light. The brightest one was my favorite.
